definition: to meet together/to assemble (of a group of people)
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: The whole family get together today.
sentences.chinese: 今天一大家人都聚齐了。

sentences.english: New digital technologies have opened up the collections to so many more people.
sentences.chinese: 新的数字技术的开放聚齐了如此多的人。
